name: Run A Morte
description:
Run A Morte

This is our Ludum Dare 46 Entry!!

In this game you have found some alien creature that appears to be blind but will react predictably, mostly,  to the tools provided.  Your goal is to used your limited tools get him safely to the end.

Tools

Wall - You can have up to 3 on the screen at once
-Can be used as a bridge
- Can be used in a stairway type pattern

Ladder- you can have up to 3 on the screen at once
-Can be used to reach higher places

Wedge- you can have up to 3 but you would never need more than one
-Can be used to make the player smaller, when he walks under it

Pad - you can have 1 on the screen
-Can be used to save the players life

Controls

Left Click - Select objects/Drop Objects into play
Right Click - deletes tools on the screen
Mouse Wheel - Rotates either the Wall, or the Ladder, which you don't "really" need to do but you still can

Thank you for playing this, and we hope you enjoy it.
